trans-unit.source: .NET Assembly File Format
trans-unit.target: .NET 組件檔格式

trans-unit.source: .NET Assembly File Format
trans-unit.target: .NET 組件檔格式

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET Assembly File Format
trans-unit.target: .NET 組件檔格式

trans-unit.source: The .NET platform defines a binary file format - “assembly” - that is used to fully-describe and contain .NET programs.
trans-unit.target: .NET 平台定義用來完整描述並包含 .NET 程式的二進位檔案格式 "assembly"。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies are used for the programs themselves as well as any dependent libraries.
trans-unit.target: 組件用於程式本身以及任何相依的程式庫。

trans-unit.source: A .NET program can be executed as one of more assemblies, with no other required artifacts, beyond the appropriate .NET runtime.
trans-unit.target: 除了適當的 .NET 執行階段之外，.NET 程式也可以執行為一個或多個沒有其他必要成品的組件。

trans-unit.source: Native dependencies, including operating system APIs, are a separate concern and are not contained within the .NET assembly format, although are sometimes described with this format (for example, WinRT).
trans-unit.target: 雖然有時會使用這種格式 (例如，WinRT) 進行描述，但是原生相依性 (包括作業系統 API) 會有不同的考量，而且不會包含在 .NET 組件格式內。

trans-unit.source: Each CLI component carries the metadata for declarations, implementations, and references specific to that component.
trans-unit.target: 每個 CLI 元件都會攜帶該元件特定宣告、實作和參考的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the component-specific metadata is referred to as component metadata, and the resulting component is said to be self-describing – from ECMA 335 I.9.1, Components and assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 因此，元件特定中繼資料是指元件中繼資料，而且產生的元件即為來自 ECMA 335 I.9.1 的自我描述元件和組件。

trans-unit.source: The format is fully specified and standardized as ECMA 335.
trans-unit.target: 格式會完整指定並標準化為 ECMA 335。

trans-unit.source: All .NET compilers and runtimes use this format.
trans-unit.target: 所有 .NET 編譯器和執行階段都會使用這種格式。

trans-unit.source: The presence of a documented and infrequently updated binary format has been a major benefit (arguably a requirement) for interoperatibility.
trans-unit.target: 所記載且不常更新之二進位格式的目前狀態已是互通性的主要優點 (即需求)。

trans-unit.source: The format was last updated in a substantive way in 2005 (.NET 2.0) to accommodate generics and processor architecture.
trans-unit.target: 這種格式上次在 2005 年進行重大更新 (.NET 2.0)，可容納泛型和處理器架構。

trans-unit.source: The format is CPU- and OS-agnostic.
trans-unit.target: 格式為 CPU 並且無作業系統無關。

trans-unit.source: It has been used as part of .NET runtimes that target many chips and CPUs.
trans-unit.target: 它已用作將目標設為許多晶片和 CPU 的 .NET 執行階段一部分。

trans-unit.source: While the format itself has Windows heritage, it is implementable on any operating system.
trans-unit.target: 雖然格式本身具有 Windows 傳承，但是可在任何作業系統上實作。

trans-unit.source: It’s arguably most significant choice for OS interoperability is that most values are stored in little-endian format.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統互通性的最重大選擇就是大部分值都是以位元組由小到大格式儲存。

trans-unit.source: It doesn’t have a specific affinity to machine pointer size (for example, 32-bit, 64-bit).
trans-unit.target: 它沒有電腦指標大小 (例如，32 位元、64 位元) 的特定同質性。

trans-unit.source: The .NET assembly format is also very descriptive about the structure of a given program or library.
trans-unit.target: .NET 組件格式對於指定的程式或程式庫結構也具有相當的描述性。

trans-unit.source: It describes the internal components of an assembly, specifically: assembly references and types defined and their internal structure.
trans-unit.target: 它會特別描述組件的內部元件︰定義的組件參考和類型，以及其內部結構。

trans-unit.source: Tools or APIs can read and process this information for display or to make programmatic decisions.
trans-unit.target: 工具或 API 可以讀取和處理這項資訊以供顯示，或進行程式設計決策。

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: The .NET binary format is based on the Windows [PE file](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_Executable) format.
trans-unit.target: .NET 二進位格式是根據 Windows [PE 檔案](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_Executable)格式。

trans-unit.source: In fact, .NET class libraries are conformant Windows PEs, and appear on first glance to be Windows dynamic link libraries (DLLs) or application executables (EXEs).
trans-unit.target: 事實上，.NET 類別庫是一致的 Windows PE，並且顯示在第一次看到 Windows 動態連結程式庫 (DLL) 或應用程式執行檔 (EXE) 時。

trans-unit.source: This is a very useful characteristic on Windows, where they can masquerade as native executable binaries and get some of the same treatment (for example, OS load, PE tools).
trans-unit.target: 這是 Windows 上極為實用的特性，在此，它們可以偽裝為原生可執行二進位檔，並進行一些相同的處理 (例如，OS 載入、PE 工具)。

trans-unit.source: Assembly headers
trans-unit.target: 組件標頭

trans-unit.source: Assembly Headers from ECMA 335 II.25.1, Structure of the runtime file format.
trans-unit.target: 來自 ECMA 335 II.25.1 的組件標頭 (執行階段檔案格式的結構)。

trans-unit.source: Processing the Assemblies
trans-unit.target: 處理組件

trans-unit.source: It is possible to write tools or APIs to process assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 可能會撰寫工具或 API 來處理組件。

trans-unit.source: Assembly information enables making programmatic decisions at runtime, re-writing assemblies, providing API IntelliSense in an editor and generating documentation.
trans-unit.target: 組件資訊可在執行階段進行程式設計決策、重新撰寫組件、在編輯器中提供 API IntelliSense，以及產生文件。

trans-unit.source: [System.Reflection](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.reflection.aspx) and [Mono.Cecil](http://www.mono-project.com/docs/tools+libraries/libraries/Mono.Cecil/) are good examples of tools that are frequently used for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: [System.Reflection](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.reflection.aspx) 和 [Mono.Cecil](http://www.mono-project.com/docs/tools+libraries/libraries/Mono.Cecil/) 是常用於此目途之工具的不錯範例。
